author: beforeitsnews.com
title: The Orchestrated Invasion of Locusts | Opinion - Conservative
text:
(Before It's News)
InstigatorNews
By Dr. Jim Garrow Many of the folks who scour the pages of Internet posts and the current media, whether it’s the written word or that delivered by the medium of television, see reports of disasters worldwide.
The mainstream media however, is so left in their leanings that they almost topple over in their biased reportage of the “collective” picture.
Unless America steps back from their television sets and takes that wider view of events that are deliberately not connected by a less than honest 5th Estate they will miss the enormity of a “judgement” being adjudicated across the planet.
CONTINUE READING »
